DIALOG.TITLE: Declare Record
DIALOG.MESSAGE: This document was previously declared as a record and was rejected.

ERRORS.FOLDER: Declare folder as record is not currently supported

BULK-OPERATION.SUCCESS: Item has been declared as record

REJECTED-INFO-RECORD.SUB-TITLE: The file '{{ nodeName }}' was rejected as a record
REJECTED-INFO-RECORD.WARNING: If you remove the rejected record warning then the options to declare the file as a record will be available again
REJECTED-INFO-RECORD.FAILED-REMOVE: Failed to remove rejected warning of {{nodeName}} : {{errorMessage}}

ICONS-TOOLTIP-MESSAGE.REJECTED-RECORD-HYPERLINK: Record was rejected, view file information for details

DIALOG.TITLE: Remove Record Instance
DIALOG.YES-ALL: REMOVE, AND DON'T SHOW THIS AGAIN

MESSAGE.DELETE: This instance of '{{name}}' will be permanently removed, and will not be retrievable from the trash.
MESSAGE.ADDITIONAL: The record '{{name}}' that resides in your organisation's records management system will not be affected.

MOVE-RECORD.TITLE: Move
MOVE-RECORD.SAME-FOLDER-MOVE: Cannot move to the same folder

STORE.TITLE: Send to Archive
STORE.SUCCESS: The file {{ name }} will be archived

ERRORS.RESTORED: Unable to archive the restored items
ERRORS.FOLDER: Restoring from archive is not currently supported

DIALOG.TITLE: Send to Archive
DIALOG.MESSAGE: You are about to send files to an external archive. There may be a cost associated with retrieving files from the archive. Are you sure you want to continue?

RESTORE.TITLE: Restore from Archive
RESTORE.SYNC-ERROR: The file you are trying to restore has not been synchronized to archive yet. This operation might take up to 24 hours. Please try again later.
RESTORE.FAIL: Failed to restore {{ name }} from the archive

LABEL.DURATION: How long will files be restored for? (days)

ERRORS.EXISTING-SYNC-ERROR: The files you are trying to restore have not been synchronized to archive yet. This operation might take up to 24 hours. Please try again later.
ERRORS.NOT-STORED: The item you are trying to restore has not been synchronized to archive yet
ERRORS.FOLDER: Restoring a folder is not currently supported

EXTEND-RESTORE.TITLE: Extend Restore Time
EXTEND-RESTORE.SUCCESS: Restore duration will be extended to '{{ days }}' days from {{ date }}
EXTEND-RESTORE.FAIL: Failed to extend restore time of {{ name }} from the archive

ICONS-TOOLTIP-MESSAGE.STORE: This file is archived. To restore, right click and select restore from the archive.
ICONS-TOOLTIP-MESSAGE.PENDING-RESTORE: Currently restoring files from the archive. If you cannot preview the file or download it, please try again later

MANAGE_HOLDS.DIALOG_WARNING_MESSAGE: Changes here will not be applied if you switch tabs.
MANAGE_HOLDS.BULK_APPLY_HOLDS_SUCCESS: Legal Hold action was successful. {{ totalItems }} items have been added to the Legal Hold.
MANAGE_HOLDS.BULK_APPLY_HOLDS_STARTED: Bulk Legal Hold action is running in the background. You will be notified when it is complete.
MANAGE_HOLDS.BULK_APPLY_HOLDS_PARTIAL_SUCCESS: Archived, duplicated or locked content has been detected. {{ errorsCount }} items have not been added to the Legal Hold.
MANAGE_HOLDS.BULK_APPLY_HOLDS_FAIL: Placing content on Legal hold failed.
MANAGE_HOLDS.BULK_APPLY_HOLDS_CANNOT_BE_APPLIED_TO_FO: Bulk Legal Hold cannot be applied to folders
MANAGE_HOLDS.WARNING_DIALOG_MESSAGE:
This action will change the Legal Holds status of All files in this search files.

This Legal Hold will not be applied to folders.
MANAGE_HOLDS.NO_RECORDS_MANAGEMENT_SITE: Admin must create Record Management Site to activate Legal Holds

SECURITY_MARKS.HELP_ICON_TEXT: Applying security marks will restrict access to digital content. Only people with matching marks applied to their user permission will be able view or edit marked content.
